Affirmative.definition: asserting the existence of certain facts esp. in support of a cause of action [ proof] 2

1.definition: asserting the existence of certain facts esp. in support of a cause of action [ proof]

2.definition: resulting from an intentional act [ concealment]

3.definition: involving or requiring application of effort [an duty]

4.definition: favoring or supporting a proposition or motion [an vote]
